title: URL Phishing Detection
description: A machine learning-based system to detect phishing websites using a dataset of phishing and benign URLs. Integrated with a real-time browser extension for proactive user protection.

title: Vulnerability Management Dashboard
description: An interactive dashboard that analyzes vulnerabilities from open-source scanners and provides automated risk scoring and remediation suggestions.

title: Forest Fire Prediction System
description: Built a web interface integrated with a backend ML model to predict the likelihood of forest fires using real-time environmental data.

title: Weather Or Not
description: A responsive weather forecasting website with real-time updates and geolocation-based personalized forecasts using external weather APIs.
